content:
I apologize for not providing the links directly in my previous response. Here are the direct links to the resources I mentioned:

1. US Government Resources:
* American Red Cross: <https://www.redcross.org/take-a-class/first-aid/first-aid-training/first-aid-tips-and-resources.html>
* Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC): <https://www.cdc.gov/headsup/youthsports/index.html>
* National Institutes of Health (NIH): <https://medlineplus.gov/ency/article/000026.htm>
2. College Websites:
* National Athletic Trainers' Association (NATA): <https://www.nata.org/>
* University of Washington's Sports Medicine Department: <https://www.uwmedicine.org/specialties/sports-medicine>
* University of Michigan's Injury Prevention Center: <https://injurycenter.umich.edu/>

I hope these links are helpful!
